item.title: LG releases cheaper OLED 4K TVs
item.description:
LG releases cheaper OLED 4K TVs

LG has released two lower cost OLED 4K TV models to go along with its high-end G6 and E6. The flat-panel B6 and curved C6 are the latest additions to LG's pretty great lineup of OLED TVs. Both sets will come in 55-inch and 65-inch models, run WebOS 3.0, and support both Dolby Vision and Ultra HD Premium HDR formats.

item.title: LG's 2016 OLED 4K TV lineup is still expensive, starts at $3,999
item.description:

At the highest end of this already pricy scale are LG's models with its new "Picture on Glass" design, which are only around a tenth of an inch thin and feature a translucent glass back. item.description:

Nun kommt zusammen, was zusammen gehört: Der Panasonic OLED-TV TX-65CZW954 für 9.999 EUR kann sein Können bei der Präsentation von Ultra HD Blu-ray/HDR-Content im Zusammenspiel mit dem Ultra HD-Blu-ray-Player Panasonic DMP-UB900 unter Beweis stellen.
